titles.title: A resolution expressing support for the ideals and goals of Citizenship Day 2009.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
9/16/2009--Passed Senate without amendment. Supports the ideals of Citizenship Day 2009.
Recognizes: (1) that citizens from all backgrounds have made countless contributions to the strength of the United States; and (2) the initiative taken by immigrants to learn about the responsibilities and significance of U.S. citizenship.
